main event: A silver triangular object was observed from aircraft at 6,000 feet altitude over the Pacific Ocean, moving parallel to the observer's aircraft for about 3 minutes before disappearing to the west.
interesting points: The object was described as triangular in shape and silver-colored,It moved at high speed at an altitude of approximately 30,000 feet,No contrails were observed during the sighting,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The object was not identified as any known aircraft.
